TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CheckBoxRenderer extends System.Object
public ref class CheckBoxRenderer abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CheckBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有或不具有可视样式的复选框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a check box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组可用于呈现复选框控件的 `static` 方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a check box control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制复选框，请使用 方法之一。To draw a check box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种选项，例如使用复选框绘制文本或图像。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the check box. 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于当前应用程序， 将用当前视觉样式绘制复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则， 将以经典 Windows 样式绘制复选框。Otherwise, will draw the check box with the classic Windows style. 如果要绘制的自定义控件应自动匹配操作系统的当前视觉样式设置，这将很有用。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类包装设置为由 类公开的元素之一的 功能。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用视觉样式呈现控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写一个自定义控件，该控件使用 方法绘制一个响应鼠标单击的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the method to draw a check box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a check box control.

span.span: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于当前应用程序，则此方法将绘制具有当前视觉样式的复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的复选框。Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于当前应用程序，则此方法将绘制具有当前视觉样式的复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则，它会绘制带有经典 Windows 样式的复选框。Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用自定义控件的 方法中的 方法，以鼠标指针位置确定的状态绘制一个复选框。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a check box in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 复选框标志符号的大小由操作系统的当前视觉样式决定。The size of the check box glyph is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来确定复选框文本的边界。The following code example uses the method to determine the bounds of the check box text. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现器是否使用应用程序状态来确定呈现样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果使用应用程序状态确定呈现样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性， 将使用 属性中的设置来确定呈现样式。If the property is `true`, the uses the setting from the property to determine the rendering style. 如果 `false`，则呈现器将始终使用视觉样式呈现。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
